author: jonesde
msg: Some cleanups, especially to show stack traces to make it easier to track down problems, like the autoconnect setting problem which is a no-no when there is a transaction in place, should now work properly

author: jm
msg: more efficient 'check_main'-implementation-required; change check_main API to return 1, and only if it returns undef (as it does when unimplemented), perform the have_plugin() call

author: sichen
msg: Also show the extra data for requirements for the other Approved Product Requirements form.

author: schor
msg: No Jira - add Incubation Disclaimer to common_book_info

author: sichen
msg: Improve the getRequirementsForSupplier service to include useful data about the supplier and product.  Required replacing the simple method with a java service due to the complexity.  Improved requirement forms as well.
